author: Andy J Lovell
comment: Extremely Accurate. I was actually taken back at how accurate it is. Cool little themes to download for free too, using the cube one. I'm using Sam Galaxy S4 Mini tho, May be different with different phone's for obvious reasons. Quality of phone and sensors and if set up right etc etc. Just letting you s4 mini users know it's ok for your sexy little phone like mine lol :)
title: I Like It

author: Andris Millers
comment: All right if see from top. If try see more than 90 degress ball flipped upside down. This strange effect seems on my Sony Xperia tipo dual and on my Huawei G510. I need current reading mark (red line that cross scale in my side for precise read). All other works perfect. Good compass.
title: Something wrong from bottom side

author: Andrew WaySheGoes
comment: Finally found a compass app that gives me the same reading as my real compass! After having tried 3-4 other apps with no success, I'm glad to have found this one. Still had to hold my phone right for correct reading though. Other than that I woulda gave 5 stars.
title: The best compass app I've tried so far.

author: Who Am I
comment: Works. But i thought it was gimmicky. All the positions i can hold my phone in that this compass displays usefully, my 2d compass also displays usefully. And all the positions i can hold my phone in that don't give me a useful display on my 2d compass, also don't give me a useful display on this compass. Nice idea but no real benefit over 2d compass was noticed.
title: Works

author: loose canon
comment: just bought this supposed? compass it does not work. it is the second one that doesn't work I don't think I will bother with any more  google purchases, I have only just got my tablet. two out of two that's a good start?
title: Loose Cannon

author: Haider Shahid
comment: Works perfectly. Has fair customization. Just wanted 2 think. A little bit higher resolution of the compass itself and a simple red pointer at the top. We might not always looking for the principal directions.. great work developers. Cheers
title: Awesome app but

author: steve betts
comment: Problem is its just not reliable on my Sony Experia compact z3 it seems to be out by 25 degrees or so, sometimes East and at other times West. On my Moto360 watch it's upside down and North points more or less south. shame as I said the way it floats in space is pretty.
title: Didn't dislike it as it's very pretty.

author: Nix Canpor
comment: So, this compass works by detecting the phone's pitch and roll, only needing the user to adjust yaw (rotate horizontally). Thereby not having to place the phone truly flat. Makes all other compass apps useless. PERFECT
title: Common sense

author: Jenendra Wadduwage
comment: Top surface shows the right direction. Bottom side the total opposite however. Top North is aligned with bottom South and so on.
title: Works but faulty

author: Stan Wilde
comment: It used to work but doesn't now. You'd get horribly lost if you relied on this, it's useless. Uninstalling!
title: Gets lost!

comment: Mostly works fine. Sometimes, it shows wrong reading. Rarely. But we cannot expect more than this from a smart phone app. Its better than most apps. I recommend to download it.
title: Works good.

author: John R
comment: Many compass apps want to start at boot and have too many permissions but not this one. Its accurate and works well and best of all has only necessary permissions! Update: this is now the 2nd best of all the ones I tested so I will keep the top 2. I still like this one a lot!
title: I like it

author: G Pg
comment: I didn't calibrate that... so I got a bad result... after calibrating, this app indicated the right direction in comparison of my real expensive compass... the difference is only 30-40 degrees... not bad indeed... ☺
title: Quite good

author: Robert Sink
comment: and open source.. what more could one ask for?  Oh, you want it to float magically in 3D remaining always level to the ground too?  Want it to work on your Android Wear device? This dev has got you covered.
title: Best Compass

author: Binks Mike
comment: On wear all motions are inverted, and on phone and wear compass is aprox 220 degrees off. (note 3, note edge, Moto 360)

author: Jimmy King
comment: Is this some sort of a joke. It's just a picture of a compass. Does nothing. Motorola G2 with internet and location services enabled.
title: Having a laugh?

author: David R
comment: 3D floating compass levels itself.  Magnetic readings only (doesn't calculate True north).
title: Nice.  Compass usable even when holding device vertical.

author: Roger Fritchman
comment: Save big $$$ if you use see through function. Makes a great hand bearing compass. Its accurate enough for any use . All depends on quality of phone. Used for sailing for years.  The gimbal is a great help. And with the new see through screen its the worlds best. If the see through screen was telephoto it would be perfect. This is as good as it gets on a phone
title: Its better than all the rest

author: Clarence Nifras
comment: Points north however your phone is tilted. Why settle for 2d compasses? And no annoying ads!
title: 3d compass!

author: A Google User
comment: This doesn't work with my Android watch.
title: No

author: Lyn Knowlo
comment: Moto e 2nd gen, thus app just shows a compass graphic which doesn't move! Useless.
title: Rubbish

author: YOGESH DIXIT
comment: The compass shoing wrong direction when i have update to new version. My phone is  lava iris 501.
title: Problem with new version

author: Pete Gower
comment: black compass, purple background, magenta txt, no gitter, awesome, if its not working get a better phone!!!
title: wow

author: Bernie Duggan
comment: A useful app.  Unfortunately, when I installed MC on my new HTC 610 Desire it no longer works - just an immobile, flat compass disc.
title: Marine Compass no longer works

author: Adrian Don
comment: Tried many compass apps but this is the first that actually points accurately! Simple but good and great design. Nexus 4 kitkat,  then LG G3 Lollipop 5.0.
title: Excellent!

author: Андрей Николаев
comment: No unnecessary permissions :) But looks ugly, you need to redo graphics.
title: Just works

author: Madan Kumar
comment: It did not work on my Moto e2
title: Not working

author: T Bo
comment: It's accurate all the time after required new calibration
title: Samsung note 3

author: Michael Gramm
comment: After I did calibration it worked perfect. Even in the house...
title: Works pretty good right from the start

author: Al
comment: Works great on my older Motorola Droid Turbo. However it doesn't work at all on the Moto z2 Force.

author: Chris 123
comment: Really nice. Love lightning launcher, that's why I tried this.
title: Cool compass.

author: Rodney Fleckenstein
comment: Use this to align my telescope to true N.  Works just fine never have any problems with auto align in EQ North mode.
title: Marine compass

author: John Chiasson
comment: Only improvement would be optional lubber line, bezel and side view window to mimic a scuba compass. Would be handy for training students.
title: Nice

author: David Tan
comment: Worked well  in samsung ace3
title: Don't work on samsung J5

author: Adi Chandra Wijaya
comment: Wonderful, it works even in vertical position.
title: Lenovo P780

comment: Worst compass ever. Doesnt rotate. Dont install.

author: Bill Wood
comment: Works perfectly, could look at it just because its so facinating!
title: Fabulous

author: Rajendra Jaiswal
comment: best app for compass and ad free ..suprb .. it's works like charm .. very accurate.

author: sheshmani sahay
comment: When see from bottom it shows exactly opposite direction.  Team pls check and correct to get 5*
title: Need little correction

author: Brian Gregory
comment: But missing option to select magnetic north or true north.
title: Good.
